content.text:
# Draft:Edward Vernon Harbord, 4th Baron Suffield

----
Edward Vernon Harbord, 4th Baron Suffield (19th June 1813 - 22nd August 1853) was the eldest son of Edward Harbord, 3rd Baron Suffield.
He was educated at Eton College and Christ Church, Oxford at Oxford University.
He became 4th Baron Suffield upon the death of his father, 6th July 1835.
He married Charlotte Susannah Gardner, daughter of Admiral Alan Hyde Gardner, 2nd Baron Gardner and Charlotte Elizabeth Smith. Their wedding took place on 1st September 1835.
He passed away with no issue on 22nd August 1853. His half brother Charles succeeded him as 5th Baron Suffield.
